I’m typically a 14/16 very top heavy 40G or 42DDD bottom I’m a solid 14. My pants weren’t too big as some folks mentioned nor were my sleeves too long. I hope this helps. 评论详情: From Her Perspective:  The top and bottom are two different sizes. The pants fit me just fine, but the jacket is SO big! The fabric is really soft and airy despite being thick. I use the pants tor my dance classes, but not with the jacket. I only used the jacket with the pants when we went to a cold mountain vacation to stay warm.
